name: One room to another - LD 37
description:
UPDATE

Version updated, few bugs fixed and new level or two added. Still no time but I I hope to add many levels soon!

This is an awesome logical platform game! I don't know that it doesn't look like superior game but you must try it! You jump with space, walk with arrows and change switch with left ctrl. I haven't time to do many levels, maybe I will upload it also for jam!

Arcade-logic-platformer.

For Ludum Dare #37

Project started about 12 h before end of the compo.
